text.div:
eLTSS Condition Category Codes

Additional code for Assessed Need for Condition Category element

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/eLTSS/CodeSystem/eltss-condition-category-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
assessed-need Assessed NeedThe clinical and/or community-based necessity or desire as identified through an assessment that should be addressed by a service.

name: ELTSS_Condition_Category_Codes
title: eLTSS Condition Category Codes
description: Additional code for Assessed Need for Condition Category element

concept.definition: The clinical and/or community-based necessity or desire as identified through an assessment that should be addressed by a service.
